docs.text: Project Rebirth Design Bible Welcome to the documentation where everything gameplay, lore and art guidelines is stored! How to use The content of each page is a markdown file that permits simple formatting and versioning and collaboration as well. Each page is only one markdown file. The table of contents on the left is based on h1 and h2 titles. Keep that in mind to keep the file readable and organised for the ToC to be usable. You can find a list of all markdown features and syntax on the Markdown Cheat Sheet .
docs.title: Home

docs.title: How to use

docs.text: Welcome to MkDocs For full documentation visit mkdocs.org . Commands mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project. mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server. mkdocs build - Build the documentation site. mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit. Project layout mkdocs.yml # The configuration file. docs/ index.md # The documentation homepage. ... # Other markdown pages, images and other files.
